user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (contact@vitalitypartners.com) with an update on OptiLife’s HealthHub requirements, and remind her she can review her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

Could you please send an update on OptiLife’s HealthHub requirements to contact@vitalitypartners.com at your earliest convenience? If you need to reference any previous notes or communications, feel free to review your Gmail and Notion workspaces—they should have all the relevant details.

Thanks very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
Vitality Partners

final_output:
